characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. A motorcyclist appears to have fallen on the road, causing potential danger. The self-driving vehicle is approaching the scene, and the driver needs to react quickly to avoid a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is decelerating to avoid hitting the motorcyclist who has fallen on the road. The vehicles speed is gradually decreasing as it approaches the scene.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, fallen on the road, causing the vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right: A white sedan, approximately 15 meters away, parked on the roadside, potentially obstructing the view.

characters: Driver of a yellow car, person on a scooter, person bending down
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with moderate traffic. A yellow car is seen on the right side, moving ahead. A person on a scooter and another person bending down are present in the middle of the road, creating a potential hazard.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching the yellow car and the individuals in the middle of the road. The vehicles speed is steady, and it is keeping a safe distance from the yellow car ahead.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A yellow car, approximately 10 meters away, moving ahead. 2) Front: A person on a scooter, approximately 5 meters away, stationary in the middle of the road. 3) Front: A person bending down, approximately 5 meters away, stationary in the middle of the road.
